DOC.brief_title: Influence Global Postural Reeducation Personality Posture
DOC.detailed_description: This study realize university student . For first objective study , participant complete `` big five questionnaire '' determine personality traits subject analyze stabilometric platform cervical/lumbar range motion ( ROM ) determine basal parameter . The personality traits basal stabilometric parameter like postural sway , cross investigate possible relation . For second objective , randomize study effectiveness Global Postural Reeducation ( GPR ) stabilometric parameter , subject divide experimental group control group . Experimental group treat 45 minute GPR session , three posture : first stretch anterior muscular chain patient lie supine couch arm 45 degree , hip open , foot opposition top couch . This posture maintain 25-30 minute . In second GPR posture , stretch posterior muscular chain , subject position leg elevate , 12-15 minute . Third position participant upright stand posture 2-5 minute integrate postural correction . During time , physiotherapist us manual therapy stretch muscle official rule GPR technique . Group control receive technique . After time intervention intervention , second measure stabilometric parameter ROM take . After first day , two day later seven day later , measure repeat determinate permanence effect GPR technique . The improvement assess calculate indicator clinical relevance : relative risk ( RR ) , absolute risk reduction ( AR ) . The result compare statistically determine possible relation . The confidence interval ( CI ) calculate relevant parameter . The analysis make statistic program ( SPSS 19.0 )
